alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 7:03PM PST until January 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Strongest for coastal Los Angeles County from Malibu to the Hollywood Hills. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include Highways 1 and 101.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
